string_table.name: pxabnsnfns00001100101
string_table.string: Closed captions. Press the spacebar to toggle captions on and off.
Skip navigation. Press enter to return to the slide.

slidelink.displaytext: CLASS- X
I posted the letter after I .................... it.
If it .................... we shall go on picnic.
The train .......... before I reached the station. ( leave )
The peon .................. the bell by the time we reach school.( ring)
Kamla ............... for an hour when I reached her house. ( sleep )
Hurry up ! Everybody .................. for you. ( wait )
I ............... (watch) a very interesting film now.
My husband ................... (like) tea for breakfast.
Many foreign birds ............. (come) to India these days.
She ............... (write) twenty plays so far.
I ................ (get) a letter from him ten days ago.
Look ! It ............... (rain) now.
Every winter our school ................ (go) on a trip.
Rohit ................ (learn) Urdu for five years.
The postman .................. (deliver) the post by 11 a.m. everyday.
While the doctor .................... (examine) the patient, there was an uproar in the hall.
Priyanka ................... (begin) to live in this locality recently.
Tomorrow is a holiday. The offices .................. (remain) closed.
In her youth, she ................... (spend) hours standing before the mirror.
Bhima .................. (throw) the ball so hard that all his companions failed to stop it
The pilot came down after the plane .................. (land).
Vivek with his friend Imtiyaz ................... (go) to Indore by the night bus today.
The Prime Minister .................... ( address ) the people on the television yesterday.
We .................... ( see ) a big snake on the ground while we were cleaning it.
The date of examination has been declared so the students .................... ( prepare ) for it these days.
The farmer .................... ( divide ) his property among his sons before he died.
The Principal .................... ( distribute ) the annual prizes tomorrow.
Look ! an old man .................... ( run ) after the bus to catch it.
Most of the people .................... ( worship ) God daily before taking tea.
When the rain started we .................... ( stand ) in the field.
The movement of the earth on its axis…………day and night. (cause)
The carpenter ……….the new furniture for my shop last year. (prepare)
No body will leave the hall if the policemen……(not allow)
Himanshu ………up the water bottle when the school bell rang. (fill)
The manager ……….…the bonus next week. (give)
After the storm………..the traveller went away. (stop)
The police team ………..the thieves who had escaped from the prison. (search)
Look at the evening star. How beautifully it…….. (shine)
Hemant ________ (come) here every week end.
You ________ (not finish) the story yet.
Once upon a time there ________ (be) a big banyan tree.
Ramesh ________ (finish) this novel last night
If you run fast, you ________ (catch) the bus.
They ________ (pay) their debts next week
Students ________ (read) English at this time tomorrow.
If Sheetal ________ (invite) me, I would have attended her party
Look ! A man ------------------------- (run) after a bus.
People whitewash houses before Diwali.
They killed the lion.
Who will help you ?
Ramayana ..................... by Tulsidas.
The sale of tickets for the show .................... from next week.
A set of this new furniture ...................... to our office by Mewar Furniture last year.
The daily newspaper 'The Rajasthan Ujala' ...................... in our town even now.
The merit holder students ........................ by the Board last month.
Many books .................... by the city library every year.
We flew kites.
Shushma is preparing sweets.
Plants ________ by the gardener yesterday.
English ________ to us everyday.
Mr. Sharma teaches us English.
The students should not leave bicycles unlocked.
